summary: User-centered UI/UX designer with 7+ years of experience crafting intuitive digital experiences. Specializing in design systems, accessibility, and user research. Passionate about creating products that balance aesthetic appeal with functional usability across platforms.

jobs.title: Senior UX Designer
jobs.description: Lead designer for enterprise SaaS applications and consumer-facing mobile products.
achievements: Designed and implemented a comprehensive design system that reduced inconsistencies by 75% and increased development velocity by 40%.
Led UX research initiatives that increased user retention by 35% through data-driven design improvements.
Mentored junior designers and established a design critique process that improved team collaboration and output quality.

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description: Created user interfaces and experiences for mobile and web applications across various industries.
achievements: Redesigned a healthcare app that improved patient engagement by 62% and received industry recognition for accessibility.
Established a user-centered design process that reduced development rework by 45%.
Created interactive prototypes that effectively communicated complex interactions to stakeholders and development teams.

promotions.title: Senior Product Designer
achievements: Led the design team for a major fintech client project with over 3 million users.
Integrated accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) into design processes, making products more inclusive.

jobs.title: UI Designer
jobs.description: Designed user interfaces for web applications and marketing websites.
achievements: Created styleguides and component libraries that were implemented across 15+ client projects.
Collaborated closely with developers to ensure design fidelity during implementation.
Redesigned company website resulting in a 50% increase in client inquiries.

education.description: Focus on digital product design, user-centered methodologies, and interaction psychology. Senior project featured in annual design showcase.
